reviews.review_msg: Ridiculously easy. Papers and assignments are given full credit just for being grammatical and making sense. Exam questions are given in advance and the answers are directly out of the lecture notes. There's no reason to read the book or attend class. Hardly any material. Whole course could be taught in 4 weeks.

Unclear with exam expectations. Seems easy because you get the questions before the exam. The class has concluded that she decides your mark based on drawing marks from a hat. Totally random. Does not explain things well.
